creditline: Gift of the Frederick Hammersley Foundation
description: computer printed on pinfed paper with vertical row of holes at left and right edges of sheet; design of squared-off wavy lines with vertical rows between lines; periods, apostrophes and unidentifiable letters; bottom half of upside-down numbers printed in red in LLC
inscription: LRC in pencil: 71. | on back in pencil: cdd71.03
signed: LLC in pencil: F. Hammersley | bottom center, printed: UP & DOWN WITH A STICK | LRC, printed: 10 NOV 69
title: Up & Down with a Stick
